channel.title: [PI]Slayer Skillcape Emote Fix
channel.description:
It's really quite simple. Posting this because well it took me forever to find. I digged and digged and finally found a gfx list that had it.
Old gfx: 827 New gfx: 1656
[hr]
I take no credit for this work I just am posting this because I know most servers still have the wrong gfx id.

item.title: [PI]Slayer Skillcape Emote Fix
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

Well obviously with the amount of trolls on r-s/mscp I was implying I didn’t want “0mg l33ch0r” on my thread as I wasn’t taking credit for “ripping” or anything like that. Why? I believe you answered that earlier.

It's just an id

Read full topic
